_header: In the midst of May at morn as I ment
_description: The Buke of the Howlat — seventy-seven 13-line stanzas (ababababcdddc)

Banna.First Lines:
In the myddis of mii at morne as Iment I mentThrow mirth
                    markit on mold till a grene meid…
Banna.Last Lines:
…In middis of murrayThus in a tyme be TernwayHapnit
                    Holland

Asloan.First Lines:
In þe myddis of may at morne as I mentThrowe myrth markit on
                    mold till a grene meid…
Asloan.Last Lines: …Thus on a tyme be teruwayhappinnit holland
Asloan.Note: Transcript in Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.III.450/1 [olim Laing 450], ff. 8-36.
Asloan.Attributed Title:
Heir begynis þe buke of þe howlat (f. 213); Heir endes þe
                    buke of þe howlat per m. Johannis asloan (f.
                    228v)
